parameters.name: Account.AdviserId
parameters.description: The user ID that you have been provided with.

parameters.name: Account.PdsId
parameters.description: PDS ID to link the account to as returned by the /api/pds/ endpoint.

parameters.name: Account.EntityType
parameters.description: Account Entity Type: 0 = Individual (use for Individual Managed account and SuperSMA), 1 = Trust, 2 = Company, 3 = Partnership, 4 = SMSF, 5 = Joint.

parameters.name: Account.CurrencyCode
parameters.description: Base currency of the account. Currently must be set to AUD.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts
parameters.description: Contains the details of the external bank account(s) used for cash flows. An account must have at least one bank account linked to the mandatory bank account usages in the PDS, except for SuperSMA accumulation accounts which should not have any linked bank accounts.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.CashContributions
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for direct debit cash contributions.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.SmaWithdrawals
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for cash withdrawals.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.PayoutIncome
parameters.description: If PayoutIncome is false for all bank accounts, then income will be reinvested into the SMA account. Otherwise, the account with this property set to true will have income paid out.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.FeeOffset
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for direct debit fee top-up.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.RegularContributionPlan
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for direct debiting regular contribution plan.

parameters.name: Account.BankAccounts.RegularWithdrawal
parameters.description: Bank account to be used for regular withdrawals.

parameters.name: Account.Models.ModelCode
parameters.description: ModelCode as returned by the /api/pds endpoint.

parameters.name: Account.Models.ModelPercent
parameters.description: Percentage to allocate to the model expressed as a decimal number. This must add to 100.

parameters.name: Account.Fees
parameters.description: Contains any fees to be overridden from the default PDS value.

parameters.name: Account.Fees.Id
parameters.description: Fee ID to override (valid IDs are returned by the PDS response).

parameters.name: Account.Fees.FeeType
parameters.description: Fee Type to override (valid types are returned by the PDS response).

parameters.name: Account.Fees.IsPercent
parameters.description: Controls if the fee is a percentage or dollar amount.

parameters.name: Account.AccountSetup
parameters.description: To be used for regular SMA accounts.

parameters.name: Account.AccountSetup.InitialInvestment
parameters.description: Initial cash investment amount to invest in the account.

parameters.name: Account.AccountSetup.InitialTransferValue
parameters.description: Estimated total in-specie value for transfers into the account.

parameters.name: Account.AccountSetup.CashInvestmentMethod
parameters.description: Initial investment source. BPay = 1, Direct Debit = 2.

parameters.name: Account.RegularContributionAmount
parameters.description: Regular contribution amount. (To be set if Account.BankAccounts.RegularContributionPlan is supplied). **Not available for SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.ContributionType
parameters.description: Regular contribution Type for SuperSMA accumulation accounts. NonConcessionalPersonal = 21, NonConcessionalSpouseAndChild = 22. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

parameters.name: Account.RegularWithdrawalAmount
parameters.description: Regular contribution amount. (To be set if Account.BankAccounts.RegularContributionPlan is supplied). **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.RegularWithdrawalFrequency
parameters.description: Regular withdrawal frequency: Monthly = 1, Quarterly = 2, Semi-annually = 3, Annually = 4 **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.ContributionSources
parameters.description: SuperSMA source of fund information. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.ContributionSources.ExpectedAmount
parameters.description: Expected contribution amount to be transferred. Set if ContributionSources.EntireBalance is false.

parameters.name: Account.ContributionSources.EntireBalance
parameters.description: Whether the entire balance of the external fund account will be transferred.

parameters.name: Account.Transfers
parameters.description: Contains details on other SuperSMA account(s) to be transferred to this account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.Transfers.TransferFromAccountId
parameters.description: Account ID of the other SuperSMA account to transfer to this account.

parameters.name: Account.Transfers.TransferMethod
parameters.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

parameters.name: Account.Transfers.Amount
parameters.description: If Account.Transfers.TransferMethod is WholeAmountKeepOpenSpecifiedAmount, the amount to be transferred.

parameters.name: Account.OtherContributions
parameters.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.OtherContributions.ContributionType
parameters.description: Source of funds. Unknown = 0, ConcessionalEmployee = 11, ConcessionalPersonal = 12, ConcessionalOtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessionalPersonal = 21, NonConcessionalSpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessionalFirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, ExemptCgt15Year = 31, ExemptCgtRetirement = 32, ExemptPersonalInjuryElection = 33, OtherGovernmentCoContribution = 41, OtherLowIncomeSuperContribution = 42.

parameters.name: Account.OtherContributions.ExpectedAmount
parameters.description: Expected other contribution amount to be transferred.

parameters.name: Account.InitialInvestmentAmount
parameters.description: For SuperSMA Accumulation accounts: the amount of cash that will be invested in the account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

parameters.name: Account.InitialInvestmentType
parameters.description: For SuperSMA Accumulation accounts: the initial investment type. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

parameters.name: Account.PaymentType
parameters.description: Whether the pension payment will be (0) a specified amount; (1) the minimum amount; or (2) the maximum amount. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.PaymentFrequency
parameters.description: Payment frequency. Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly= 6, Annually = 12. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.PaymentAmount
parameters.description: The payment amount paid from the pension account. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.Consolidation
parameters.description: Establish an accumulation account. You can open an accumulation account in the same application alongside a pension account. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

parameters.name: Account.Consolidation.UseExisting
parameters.description: Link an existing SuperSMA accumulation account to the pension account.

parameters.name: Account.Consolidation.AccountCode
parameters.description: AccountCode of the linking SuperSMA Account.

parameters.name: Account.Consolidation.CloseOnRollover
parameters.description: Specifies whether the Account provided should be closed on successful rollover.

parameters.description: For auditing purposes, the UserID of the user adding the user link.

parameters.description: Accountant = 0, Custodian = 1, FinancialPlanner = 2, InvestmentAdviser = 3, Other = 4 (**Default**), Owner = 5

parameters.name: Applicant.TaxDomicileCountryCode

parameters.name: Applicant.CitizenshipCountryCode
parameters.description: ISO alpha-3 code for the applicant's country of citizenship.

parameters.name: Applicant.Identification.IdNumber
parameters.description: TFN or ABN of the applicant. For SuperSMA accounts we require a TFN.

parameters.description:
Whether to calculate percentage returns for the period requested or include other periods.
  • 0 - For the period only
  • 4 - 1 mth, 3 mths, the period
  • 9 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, Since inception
  • 11 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception

  • 24 - 1 mth, 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period
  • 15 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs
  • 17 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 14 - 3 mths, 6 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, Since inception
  • 13 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 5 yrs, Since Inception
  • 21 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, Since inception
  • 22 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 2 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 18 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs
  • 2 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, the period
  • 8 - 3 mths, 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, Since inception
  • 10 - 1 yr, 2 yrs, 3 yrs, 4 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 19 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, 7 yrs, 10 yrs
  • 3 - 1 yr, 3 yrs, 5 yrs, the period
  • 23 - 1 yr, 5 yrs, 10 yrs, Since inception
  • 7 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 1 yr, Since inception
  • 5 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 3 yrs, 5 yrs
  • 6 - Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, 3 yrs, Since inception
  • 20 - The period, Qtr to date, Fin yr to date, Since inception
  • -1 - Portfolio default

Quantity.description: The number of securities held by the portfolio at the recalculation date.

UnitCost.description: Average unit cost of the holding. This is the actual cost divided by the quantity.

Cost.description: Actual cost is based on the cost base of unrealised holdings.

UnitValue.description: The last price of the holding available at the recalculation date.

UnitPriceDate.description: The date of the unit price.

Value.description: Value is calculated based on the unit price multiplied by the quantity.

PercentTotalValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value of this asset relative to the total portfolio value.

GainOrLoss.description: Gain/Loss is the nominal difference between the total value and the total cost of this asset.

PercentTotalGainOrLoss.description: The gain or loss expressed as a percentage over the adjusted cost base of the asset.

EstIncome.description: Indicative field calculated based on the income of each asset generated over the past twelve months.

Yield.description: The estimated income as a percentage of the market value of the portfolio.

AssetCurrency.description: The local currency of the security.

ValueAssetCurrency.description: The value based on the quantity and local price of unrealised holdings.

CostBaseUnknown.description: 0 (Cost base known) or 1 (Cost base unknown) for the holding.

TaxCredits.description: The tax credits available on the current holdings of the security.

EstFrankingCredits.description: Amount expected to be received in franking credits.

EstimatedGrossYield.description: Estimated gross yield is based on the sum of the estimated income and franking credits as a percentage of the holding's market value.

Code.description: The asset code of the receivable/payable.

Amount.description: The total value of the receivable/payable.

IncludedInNetValue.description: Returned values are either 0 (excluded from Net Value) or 1 (Included in Net Value)

Weighting.description: Account’s model weighting at the valuation date.

AUD.description: Cash model weighting at the valuation date.

PageCount.description: Number of pages in the response.

RecordsReturned.description: Number of records returned in the current response.

RecordsFound.description: Number of records found matching the search criteria.

ValuationDate.description: Date used to display the data.
Date used to display the data.

TotalCost.description: The total portfolio cost based on the cost base of unrealised holdings.

TotalValue.description: The total portfolio value based on the quantity and price of unrealised holdings.

NetValue.description: The total portfolio value inclusive of receivables and payables.

TotalGainOrLoss.description: Total Gain/Loss is the nominal difference between the total value and the total cost.

AssetClassDescription.description: A description of the asset class.

Value.description: The total value of the portfolio’s holdings within the asset class.

PercentTotalValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value of this asset class to the total portfolio value.

PercentNetValue.description: The percentage ratio of the value of this asset class to the net portfolio value.

MinTargetAllocation.description: The minimum asset class allocation target for this asset class entered for the portfolio.

MaxTargetAllocation.description: The maximum asset class allocation target for this asset class entered for the portfolio.

MidPointTargetAllocation.description: The middle value of the minimum and maximum target allocation for the asset class.

Variance.description: The variance of the asset class’ value outside of the target allocation range.

IncludedInNetValue.description: 0 if excluded from the Portfolio's NetValue, or 1 if included.

FileId.description: Unique ID of the generated file.

FileName.description: Generated file name of the report.

Application.description: The ID of the application the user will be sent to once logged in. Platform=V-Wrap, Investor=Investor Portal, Adviser=Adviser Portal, Applications=Application Portal.

Parameters.description: ItemKey / Value containing AccountID, AreaID or Frameless.

UserId.description: The ID of the user to log in. Either UserId or Username is required.

Username.description: The Praemium username/Login ID of the user to log in. Either UserId or Username is required.

Usi.description: Unique Superannuation Identifier (USI) is used in SuperStream to identify an APRA fund and/or its superannuation product which an employee (member) is contributing to.

ProductName.description: Product Name of the Superannuation fund.

CostBaseUnknown.description: 0 (Cost base known) or 1 (Cost base unknown) for the holding.

ActualCost.description: The actual cost of the security is its purchase cost, adjusted for all CGT events (other than CGT events E4 and E10) that have happened to it.

MarketValue.description: Market Value of the security at the ValuationDate.

GrossGain.description: Equal to the Market value minus the Adjusted cost. Shows the gain before any discounting or indexing is applied.

DiscountedGain.description: The net of the gross gain and discount applied based on amounts that have had the discount rate applied. If the portfolio is for a company, then the discounted rate applied will be zero. For an individual the discount rate applied is 50%.

IndexedGain.description: Shows the gain between the indexed cost and the market value, if applicable.

OtherGain.description: Equal to the gross gain if applicable.  Applies if the asset was purchased within the last 12 months relative to the as at date requested for this section.

CGTGain.description: Calculated based on what is optimal for the disposal method selected.

CGTLoss.description: Applicable if there is a loss on a tax parcel and the purchase date is post 19 September 1985.

CGTExemptGainLoss.description: The gross gain or loss on tax parcels with that are CGT exempt, including those with a purchase date before the CGT legislation applied.

TaxFreeAmount.description: Amount within the parcel that is tax free.

Id.description: Praemium user login to filter returned data based on the user’s Portfolio access.

Type.description: Applicant type. This endpoint supports Individual applicants (Type 1). For Corporate Applicants, use the /api/TrusteeApplicants endpoint.

Applicant.description: Contains the applicant data. When we have more types, the contents will be customisable based on Applicant.Type.

AdviserId.description: The user ID that you have been provided with.

AccountId.description: AccountID of the SMA account. (prefixed with ‘AU’ for Australian accounts)

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the applicant.

IsSignatory.description: Whether the applicant is a signatory on the account. We require one signatory for individual and SuperSMA accounts, and all joint account holders must be signatories.

SignatureImage.description: A base64 string representing an image of the applicant's signature. To prevent distortion of the image when it is printed, please ensure the width of the image is five times the height.

TaxRateElection.description: Praemium code for the applicant's tax status - RTFN = Resident with TFN, RABN = Resident with ABN, NRWT = Non resident of Australia, NTFN = Resident of Australia without a TFN.

TaxDomicileCountryCode.description: ISO alpha-3 code for the country where the applicant is resident for tax purposes.

CitizenshipCountryCode.description: ISO alpha-3 code for the applicant's country of citizenship.

Title.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

SuburbCounty.description: Suburb as associated with the PostCode.

CountryCode.description: ISO alpha-3 code for the country the address is in.

IdNumber.description: TFN or ABN of the applicant. For SuperSMA accounts we require a TFN.

Type.description: SMA = 1, SuperSMA Accumulation = 4, SuperSMA Pension (TTR - Transition to retirement) = 5 SuperSMA Pension (ABP - Account based pension) = 6

AdviserId.description: The user ID that you have been provided with.

PdsId.description: PDS ID to link the account to as returned by the /api/pds/ endpoint.

EntityType.description: Account Entity Type: 0 = Individual (use for Individual Managed account and SuperSMA), 1 = Trust, 2 = Company, 3 = Partnership, 4 = SMSF, 5 = Joint.

CurrencyCode.description: Base currency of the account. Currently must be set to AUD.

BankAccounts.description: Contains the details of the external bank account(s) used for cash flows. An account must have at least one bank account linked to the mandatory bank account usages in the PDS, except for SuperSMA accumulation accounts which should not have any linked bank accounts.

Fees.description: Contains any fees to be overridden from the default PDS value.

AccountSetup.description: To be used for regular SMA accounts.

RegularContributionAmount.description: Regular contribution amount. (To be set if Account.BankAccounts.RegularContributionPlan is supplied). **Not available for SuperSMA Pension**

ContributionType.description: Regular contribution Type for SuperSMA accumulation accounts. NonConcessionalPersonal = 21, NonConcessionalSpouseAndChild = 22. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

RegularWithdrawalAmount.description: Regular contribution amount. (To be set if Account.BankAccounts.RegularContributionPlan is supplied). **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

RegularWithdrawalFrequency.description: Regular withdrawal frequency: Monthly = 1, Quarterly = 2, Semi-annually = 3, Annually = 4 **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

ContributionSources.description: SuperSMA source of fund information. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

Transfers.description: Contains details on other SuperSMA account(s) to be transferred to this account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

OtherContributions.description: Contains details of other assets that will be used to fund this account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation and SuperSMA Pension**

InitialInvestmentAmount.description: For SuperSMA Accumulation accounts: the amount of cash that will be invested in the account. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

InitialInvestmentType.description: For SuperSMA Accumulation accounts: the initial investment type. **Only available for SuperSMA Accumulation**

PaymentType.description: Whether the pension payment will be (0) a specified amount; (1) the minimum amount; or (2) the maximum amount. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

PaymentFrequency.description: Payment frequency. Monthly = 1, ThreeMonthly = 3, SixMonthly= 6, Annually = 12. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

PaymentAmount.description: The payment amount paid from the pension account. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

Consolidation.description: Establish an accumulation account. You can open an accumulation account in the same application alongside a pension account. **Only available for SuperSMA Pension**

CashContributions.description: Bank account to be used for direct debit cash contributions.

SmaWithdrawals.description: Bank account to be used for cash withdrawals.

PayoutIncome.description: If PayoutIncome is false for all bank accounts, then income will be reinvested into the SMA account. Otherwise, the account with this property set to true will have income paid out.

FeeOffset.description: Bank account to be used for direct debit fee top-up.

RegularContributionPlan.description: Bank account to be used for direct debiting regular contribution plan.

RegularWithdrawal.description: Bank account to be used for regular withdrawals.

ModelCode.description: ModelCode as returned by the /api/pds endpoint.

ModelPercent.description: Percentage to allocate to the model expressed as a decimal number. This must add to 100.

Id.description: Fee ID to override (valid IDs are returned by the PDS response).

FeeType.description: Fee Type to override (valid types are returned by the PDS response).

IsPercent.description: Controls if the fee is a percentage or dollar amount.

InitialInvestment.description: Initial cash investment amount to invest in the account.

InitialTransferValue.description: Estimated total in-specie value for transfers into the account.

CashInvestmentMethod.description: Initial investment source. BPay = 1, Direct Debit = 2.

ExpectedAmount.description: Expected contribution amount to be transferred. Set if ContributionSources.EntireBalance is false.

EntireBalance.description: Whether the entire balance of the external fund account will be transferred.

TransferFromAccountId.description: Account ID of the other SuperSMA account to transfer to this account.

TransferMethod.description: WholeAmountWithClose = 0, WholeAmountKeepOpen = 1, SpecifiedAmount = 2 - whether the source account will be kept open.

Amount.description: If Account.Transfers.TransferMethod is WholeAmountKeepOpenSpecifiedAmount, the amount to be transferred.

ContributionType.description: Source of funds. Unknown = 0, ConcessionalEmployee = 11, ConcessionalPersonal = 12, ConcessionalOtherFriendsAndFamily = 13, NonConcessionalPersonal = 21, NonConcessionalSpouseAndChild = 22, NonConcessionalFirstHomeSaverAccount = 23, ExemptCgt15Year = 31, ExemptCgtRetirement = 32, ExemptPersonalInjuryElection = 33, OtherGovernmentCoContribution = 41, OtherLowIncomeSuperContribution = 42.

ExpectedAmount.description: Expected other contribution amount to be transferred.

UseExisting.description: Link an existing SuperSMA accumulation account to the pension account.

AccountCode.description: AccountCode of the linking SuperSMA Account.

CloseOnRollover.description: Specifies whether the Account provided should be closed on successful rollover.

AdviserId.description: The user ID that you have been provided with.

AccountId.description: AccountID of the SMA account. (prefixed with ‘AU’ for Australian accounts)

TrusteeName.description: Corporate trustee name. This is required if a trust or SMSF with a corporate trustee. **Only available for corporate applicants**

RegisteredNumber.description: ABN of the Super Fund (rather than the corporate trustee) for corporate applicants, or TFN for an individual trustee.

ContactName.description: Primary contact name. **Only available for corporate applicants**

ContactEmail.description: Primary contact email. **Only available for corporate applicants**

Type.description: Home = 0, Office = 1, Mailing = 2, PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness = 3. We only need 0, and 2 if it is different.

SuburbCounty.description: Suburb as associated with the PostCode.

CountryCode.description: ISO alpha-3 code for the country the address is in.

Capacity.description: Director = 1, Company Secretary = 3, Sole Director = 4, Signed Under Seal = 7 for Corporate Applicants. Trustee = 6 for individual applicants.

DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the signatory.

Title.description: Signatory's title. Valid values are: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.
